Class CommentDAOPostgres

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.persist.postgres.CommentDAOPostgres
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommentDAO
public class CommentDAOPostgres extends Object implements CommentDAO
PostgreSQL implementation of the CommentDAO interface. Provides methods for managing comments by interacting with the PostgreSQL database.

      Specified by:
      getPostComments in interface CommentDAO
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post to retrieve comments for.
      Returns:
